author: Tamil Nadu Bureau
text:
One more person surrendered before the Judicial Magistrate Court at Nilakottai in Dindigul on Friday in connection with the case pertaining to murder of Dalit youth.

Identified as V. Prasanna (20) of Palani town, he was studying B.Com second year in a private college in Udumalpet.

He informed the judge that he came to know that the police were in search of him in connection with the murder and hence he was surrendering.

Judicial Magistrate B. Risana Parveen remanded him in judicial custody and advised the police to produce him before the court in Udumalpet on March 23.

Later, he was lodged in a juvenile home in Melur near Madurai.

The police said that the CCTV video footage showed that he was handing over the key of motorcycle, which was used in the crime, to the accused.

He was the cousin brother of Ms. Kousalya.

He is the second accused to surrender before the same court in connection with the murder.

Earlier this week, Ms. Kousalya’s father Chinnasamy surrendered before the court.
title: One more surrenders in Dalit youth murder case
